name: Car Mechanic Manager
description: Manage car service, paint shop, car wash and tune cars.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible

reviews.review_text: after playing this game I come to my conclusion:  It's a fun mini-game, plays nice and smooth no problems.  overall a nice in between game for anyone who likes to play with cars :)
If you like management games this is a game for you. Be careful though, its addicting.
